posts.post_content:
I love that this has Undying (kewl mechanic) AND his chest looks like someone stuck a Duracell in 'em... "Nothing outlasts ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) the Coppertop!"  
  
So, new munchable dead guy... who should I start feeding you to with [Grave Pact](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grave Pact) out?... Zombie entourage in my **GB** Saproling deck with [Ghave, Guru of Spores](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghave, Guru of Spores) ? Naw, how about an unthreatening [Mortician Beetle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mortician Beetle) with this as as a "Power Supply" for [Phyrexian Tower](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Tower) / [Ashnod's Altar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ashnod's Altar) , massive tokens *a la* Innistrad, and then the '*piece de resistance*'... Thraximundar. Forget the Bunny... Coppertop Engine ftw!  
  
Oh, and TY WIZARDS for bringing back my favorite tribe in a BIG way the past few months! **Viva la Z-Day**!!
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
This is a crazy aggro card  
  
T1: Swamp, Dark Ritual, this guy, opponent takes 2  
T2: Assuming you attack, opponent takes 5 after, if it gets removed, opponent takes 4 and now you have a 4/3  
T3 and after: Proceed to panic opponent with his other friend friends  
  
The only not so good part is the BBB casting cost, which you can get by with dark rituals or just playing mono black
